attributes.action: introduce and sponsor a Bill to enact legislation which ensures that the warder who was observed on CCTV to break the spectacles of Charles Bronson, an inmate at HMP Full Sutton, pays for the replacement.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Bronson has been provided with new spectacles as, what he claims is, compensation for the criminal breaking of his original pair by a member of staff during an incident which was completely covered by CCTV.  If it is true that it is compensation then such compensation should come from the member of staff who criminally damaged the original spectacles and not, under any circumstances, from the public purse.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
